metadata.name: Builders
metadata.description:
Human beings are no longer able to build a future, they have lost the will to improve themselves.

Fortunately, the artificial intelligence algorithms have been reproduced and improved, leading the robots to become totally self-sufficient, to improve the economic and working system and to make them very collaborative. 

The percentage of loyal relationships between robots has risen to 98.7% in the last year, while the percentage of robots who are happy and satisfied with their lives is 96.2%.

Now they are building space bases in various planets of the solar system and conducting scientific studies, their goal is the search for new life forms.
